data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Camiguin, Philippines.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Camiguin, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Camiguin, Philippines so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Camiguin, Philippines.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Camiguin. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Camiguin that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, 2.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 25,114 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Camiguin, Philippines to the gospel today.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Camiguin, Philippines.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: Camiguin
location.people_groups_list: Palawano, Brooke's Point, Maguindanao, Sama Bangingi, Northern Sama, Sama, Southern, Manobo, Cotabato
